861030.name: Lovely Fox
861030.description:
Lovely Fox, a furry 3d adventure game about the life and times of Lovely fox and her animal friends. Your tasked with finding special flowers for the Flower king.
You will also guide Lovely fox as she decides to help others or not. Take a role in the well being of her aging grandfather, who she adores very much.
Be lovely and help others thrive!


Some Features:
Lovely female furry Fox & her Furry animal friends
Discourage bad behavior with lecture
Pick flowers
Converse with forest friends
Open world level (work in progress)
More
861030.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
